description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

@Icon[type:photon] Photon Revelation

You can channel part of the Positive Energy Plane’s brilliance. You can use this revelation when forming your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.7ilyZdE0yZi2F3SQ]{Solar Manifestation (Su)}, changing the manifestation’s properties. If your solar manifestation deals physical damage, this revelation grants the manifestation the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.xCFWNmEQCMP2pbBo]{Flaming} weapon fusion; this temporary fusion ignores item level requirements and doesn’t count toward the maximum level of fusions that your weapon can have at once. If your solar manifestation deals only energy damage, this revelation causes the manifestation to deal fire damage instead of any other energy damage types. This fire damage ignores undead creatures’ fire resistance by an amount equal to your Charisma modifier plus 1 for every 4 solarian levels you have.

If your solar manifestation provides a bonus to AC, it also grants you a +2 enhancement bonus to saving throws against death effects and effects created by undead creatures. Additionally, it grants you fire resistance equal to 1 + 1 for every 4 solarian levels you have. A @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.ylRInRfOfx6nsbUv]{Solar Shield} manifestation applies both the flaming weapon fusion effect to unarmed attacks with the shield as well as the fire resistance effect, though you only gain the fire resistance benefit while your shield is aligned, whether or not that fire damage is dealt by your target.

modifiers.name: Overwhelming Brilliance - Fire Resistance
modifiers.notes: If your solar manifestation provides a bonus to AC, it grants you fire resistance equal to 1 + 1 for every 4 solarian levels you have.
